source: ### Notebook para carga inicial de dimensiÃ³n dm_Grade

#Imports
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from delta.tables import *

# Traemos los datos desde tabla delta, dependiendo si el archivo delta final existe o no se agrega fila de valores
# no definidos


nombre_tabla = 'dm_grade'
table_delta_path = blobstorage_proc_path+'/DataMultidim/dispatch/delta/'+ nombre_tabla

if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, table_delta_path)):
    sql_command = f'''
                    select distinct sha1(cast(GradeId as string)) as id_Grade 
                           ,GradeId
                           ,Grade 
                           ,date_format('1990-01-01 00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') AS UpdateDate
                           ,current_timestamp() InsertDate                          
                    from delta.dlb_shiftloads_historico
                    where cdc >= ifnull('{cdc}','1900-01-01')
                    '''                
else:
    sql_command = f'''
                    select 0 id_Grade
                           ,'<N/A>' AS GradeId
                           ,'<N/A>' AS Grade 
                           ,date_format('1990-01-01 00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') AS UpdateDate
                           ,current_timestamp() InsertDate
                    UNION
                    select distinct sha1(cast(GradeId as string)) as id_Grade 
                           ,GradeId
                           ,Grade 
                           ,date_format('1990-01-01 00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') AS UpdateDate
                           ,current_timestamp() InsertDate
                           from delta.dlb_shiftloads_historico
                           where cdc >= ifnull('{cdc}','1900-01-01')
                    '''

new_data = spark.sql(sql_command)                
new_data.createOrReplaceTempView(nombre_tabla)

# Se crea delta si no existe o se carga en caso de existir

if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, table_delta_path)):
    deltaTable = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, table_delta_path)
else:
    new_data.write.format("delta").save(table_delta_path)
    spark.sql(f''' create table dispatch.{nombre_tabla} using delta location '{table_delta_path}' ''')
    deltaTable = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, table_delta_path)
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit('fin')

merge_command = "historico.id_Grade = new_data.id_Grade"

deltaTable.alias("historico").merge(
    new_data.alias("new_data"),
    merge_command)\
    .whenMatchedUpdate(\
        set = {\
        "GradeId": "new_data.GradeId",\
        "Grade": "new_data.Grade",\
        "UpdateDate": "new_data.InsertDate"\
        }\
                        )\
    .whenNotMatchedInsertAll()\
    .execute()
